title: Love my dog
creator_credit: Hal Roach Studios, Hal Roach and Robert F. McGowan
brief_description: Silent slapstick comedy featuring “Our Gang” and their efforts to prevent Farina’s beloved pooch being caught and put down by a dog-catcher. Cast includes Joe Cobb, Jackie Condon, Dick Gilbert, Allen “Farina” Hoskins, Scooter Lowry. Silent film with English captions.
